system.Text:
When __you achieve what you believe to be the fulfillment of your vow__, roll the challenge dice and compare to your progress. Momentum is ignored on this roll.

On a __strong hit__, your quest is complete. Mark experience (troublesome=1; dangerous=2; formidable=3; extreme=4; epic=5).

On a __weak hit__, there is more to be done or you realize the truth of your quest. Envision what you discover (@Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure). Then, mark experience (troublesome=0; dangerous=1; formidable=2; extreme=3; epic=4). You may @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.010e27aa4376d4df]{Swear an Iron Vow} to set things right. If you do, add +1.

On a __miss__, your quest is undone. Envision what happens (@Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure), and choose one.

  * You recommit: Clear all but one filled progress, and raise the quest’s rank by one (if not already epic).
  * You give up: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.f968f5e0a837a83a]{Forsake Your Vow}.

Trigger.Text: When you achieve what you believe to be the fulfillment of your vow...

If you do, add +1.

On a __miss__, your quest is undone. Envision what happens (@Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure), and choose one.

  * You recommit: Clear all but one filled progress, and raise the quest’s rank by one (if not already epic).
  * You give up: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.f968f5e0a837a83a]{Forsake Your Vow}.
